QuestData.Title: Blessing of the Green Dragonflight
QuestData.Description: You have done well, $n. Jammal'an may have escaped our grasp, but his retreat paves the way for me to enter the temple as I desire.$B$BStay where you are and do not move. I will hasten your return by pulling your spirit to me through the Emerald Dream.$B$BThis may cause slight drowsiness.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Return to me for your reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lord Itharius atop the Temple of Atal'Hakkar.
QuestData.RewardText: You have performed a great service for me and my kind, $n. Accept this as a symbol of my gratitude, and of your courage.
